text: John Rigby may refer to: *John Rigby (martyr) (c. 1570–1600), English Catholic and martyr *John Rigby (gunmaker) (1892–1916), descendant of the founder of John Rigby & Co. *Sir John Rigby (politician) (1834–1903), British lawyer and politician *John Rigby (artist) (1922–2012), Australian artist, known for his bush landscapes *John Rigby (rower) (1906–1975), New Zealand rower *John E. Rigby (1923–1972), Canadian politician *John Rigby (mathematician) (1933–2014), English mathematician *John Rigby (alpine skier) (born 1942), British former alpine skier *John Rigby (swimmer) (born 1942), Australian Olympic swimmer ==See also== *Jon Rigby (born 1965), footballer *John Rigby & Company gun and rifle makers of Dublin and London
title: John Rigby
